name: Square Forged Dev Free Demo
description:
Free for a limited time!

This game is meant to let you edit everything, from the trees to the powers. At the moment you can edit the powers. I have been working on this game for some time, and it is to a point where I am willing to show it off. This game is not finished, and has a lot of bugs.

Be warned, this is an early dev game, there is not too much to do.

NOTHING SAVES TO ANYTHING!
